{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Bluetake |model=BW320 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=02/2003 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |manuf=Gigabyte |manuf_model=GN-BR402W |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=ADMtek |cpu1_model=ADM5106 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 MiB |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Parallel |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=bluetake |default_ssid_regex=^bluetake$ |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:20:ED |oui_eth=00:20:ED }} [http://web.archive.org/web/20030204084136/http://www.bluetake.com/Products/BW320.htm Product page (via archive.org)] (first appeared Feb. 4, 2003) :[http://web.archive.org/web/20060524063144/http://www.bluetake.com/datasheets/BW320.pdf Datasheet]
This router is assumed to be a [[Gigabyte GN-BR402W]]. :Specifications from the BR402W have been transferred to this entry.
Additional specifications, per the datasheet, follow... *CPU: ARM7 arch. *Expansion: USB <small>(presumably a connection to an internal '''ADMtek''' Pegasus USB 1.1 Ethernet controller)</small>, Parallel port, Serial *10/100 LAN + WAN *Dimensions (W x L x H): [[Dimensions::137 mm x 215 mm x 36.8 mm]] *Gross weight: [[Weight::425.5 g]] *LEDs: PWR, Status, WAN, LAN1 through LAN4, USB, Wireless *HTTP management interface
==Reviews== *[http://www.pcdemano.com/modules.php?name=Sections&op=printpage&artid=664 On '''pcdemano.com'''] :00:20:ED ('''Gigabyte''') OUIs :SSID shown as '''bluetake''' *[http://web.archive.org/web/20031017064523/http://www.technoyard.com/hardware/networking/BW320/page_1.html On '''Technoyard'''], dated October 4th 2003 :USB connector is Female-B, slave only (Ethernet) :SSID shown as '''bluetake'''
